DocWhereRule.Name: HasName
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _Name_ attribute has to be provided for _IfcProject_. It is the short name for the project.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectContext
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If a _RepresentationContexts_ relation is provided then there shall be no instance of _IfcGeometricRepresentationSubContext_ directly included in the set of _RepresentationContexts_.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoDecomposition
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcProject_ represents the root of the any decomposition tree. It shall therefore not be used to decompose any other object definition.
